meanings.definition: A tall North American plant with bright yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The goldenrod swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: She picked a bouquet of goldenrod for the table centerpiece.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the goldenrod as a hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright and cheerful as a field of goldenrod.
meanings.sent5: The goldenrod stood proudly among the other wildflowers.

meanings.definition: A bright yellow color resembling that of the goldenrod plant.
meanings.sent1: The artist used goldenrod paint to create a vibrant sunset.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a beautiful shade of goldenrod.
meanings.sent3: The room glowed with the warm hue of goldenrod.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as bright and inviting as the goldenrod color.
meanings.sent5: The goldenrod color of the walls brought a sense of happiness to the room.
